name: Avanture Medvjedića Normia
description:
This is a casual mobile game made as a promotion of Normia pills from Jadran – Galenski laboratorij (JGL) factory.
As a Normia bear you are traveling throught the degistive system and avoiding all the bad bacteries which you can also destroy using their products like Normia LCC, Normia Stop, Normia Rehidro or Normia baby.
Once the bacteries atack you, you are losing the power which you can improve collecting the drops.
